contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=August 2009}} {{Infobox City Japan |Name = Yokoze |JapaneseName= 横瀬町 |settlement_type= Town |MapImage= Yokoze in Saitama Prefecture Ja.svg |Region= [[Kantō region|Kantō]] |Prefecture= [[Saitama Prefecture|Saitama]] |District= [[Chichibu District, Saitama|Chichibu]] |Area_km2= 49.35 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 9,739 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees = 35 |LatitudeMinutes = 59 |LatitudeSeconds = |LongtitudeDegrees = 139 |LongtitudeMinutes = 6 |LongtitudeSeconds = |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.yokoze.saitama.jp/ Town of Yokoze] }} {{nihongo|'''Yokoze'''|横瀬町|Yokoze-machi}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Chichibu District, Saitama|Chichibu District]], [[Saitama Prefecture|Saitama]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 9,739 and a [[population density|density]] of 197.35 persons per km². The total area is 49.35 km². The town has three public schools; Yokoze Junior High School, Yokoze Elementary School and Ashigakubo Elementary School (the latter is slated to close at the end of March, 2009 - student numbers in the past several years have been hovering at, or just below, 30 for all students, grades one to six. The largest single employer is Mitsubishi Materials. Served by the [[Seibu Railway]] with direct service to [[Ikebukuro]], in central [[Tokyo]]. ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.town.yokoze.saitama.jp/ Yokoze official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Towns in Saitama Prefecture]] [[Category:Chichibu District, Saitama]] {{Saitama-geo-stub}}
